quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
author: Claire Booth Luce

quote: A penny saved is a penny earned.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Money often costs too much.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Time is money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
author: P.T. Barnum

quote: The only thing money gives you is the freedom of not worrying about money.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: It's not about how much money you make, but how much money you keep.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Money can’t buy love, but it can buy you a better class of problems.
author: Anonymous

quote: I can’t be a millionaire, but I can be a thousandaire.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Money is like a sixth sense without which you cannot make a complete use of the other five.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

quote: The real measure of your wealth is how much you'd be worth if you lost all your money.
author: Anonymous

quote: Money is a good servant but a bad master.
author: David Foster Wallace

quote: If you think money can’t buy happiness, you’re not spending it right.
author: Anonymous

quote: There are people who have money and people who are rich.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Don't let money run your life, let money help you run your life better.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Money is a means of exchange, a tool for achieving your goals.
author: Anonymous

quote: I don't want to be a millionaire; I just want to live like one.
author: Anonymous

quote: Money is a terrible thing to waste.
author: Anonymous

quote: A rich person is nothing but a poor person with money.
author: Anonymous

quote: When I had money everyone called me brother.
author: Polish Proverb

quote: The goal isn’t more money. The goal is living life on your terms.
author: Anonymous

quote: Money is like love; it kills slowly and painfully the one who withholds it.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: There is no money in the world that can buy the happiness I feel when I’m with my family.
author: Anonymous

quote: Money will not make you happy, but you will miss it if you don’t have it.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best things in life are free, but the second best are very expensive.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: It’s good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it’s good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven’t lost the things that money can’t buy.
author: George Lorimer

quote: Money is a form of power. But what is money? Money is the measure of a man’s choices.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you can’t make money, then you don’t deserve it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: You can be young without money, but you can’t be old without it.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Money is a great servant but a poor master.
author: Philip N. McKinney

quote: Behind every fortune, there is a crime.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: If money is your hope for independence, you will never have it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Money is the best servant, but the worst master.
author: Anonymous

quote: Money may not buy happiness, but it can make you feel better while you’re being sad.
author: Anonymous

quote: The way to wealth is to learn something new every day.
author: Anonymous

quote: You can't get a cup of tea big enough or a book long enough to suit me.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Money is like manure; it’s not worth a thing unless it’s spread around encouraging young things to grow.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference.
author: Barack Obama

quote: If you don't find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Money is a tool. Used properly it makes something beautiful; used wrong, it makes a mess.
author: Brad Pitt

quote: In this world, nothing is certain except death and taxes.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: The art is not in making money, but in keeping it.
author: Anonymous

quote: It's not about the money. It's about the freedom that money brings.
author: Anonymous

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can make you miserable in style.
author: Anonymous

quote: The wise does at once what the fool does finally.
author: Baltasar Gracián

quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you want to feel rich, do not add up what you don't have, but what you do have.
author: Anonymous

quote: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me, I’m afraid of widths.
author: Steven Wright

quote: The best things in life are free. The second best are very expensive.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Make money your god and it will plague you like the devil.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Money can’t buy friends, but you can get a better class of enemies.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: First become rich, then become a philospher
author: ShahRukh Khan
